Translations.Text: God created the heavens and the earth to manifest the Truth, and to recompense each soul according to its deeds. They shall not be wronged

Do but consider: who, besides God, can guide him who makes his lust his god, whom God deliberately confounds, setting a seal upon his ears and heart, and drawing a veil over his eyes? Will you not take thought
They say: ‘There is but one life in this world and no other. We die and live; nothing but Time destroys us.‘ Surely of this they have no knowledge. They are merely guessing
And when Our veritable revelations are recited to them, their only argument is: ‘Bring back our forefathers, if what you say be true!‘
Say: ‘God it is who gives you life and then causes you to die; He will then gather you all on the Day of Resurrection, of which there is no doubt; yet most do not know it.‘
